description: Master the art of trampoline physics to recover stolen items while dodging pursuing cats.
rationale: This game focuses on rhythmic timing and vertical navigation logic. It targets players who enjoy classic arcade physics and serves as an excellent environment for RL agents to learn momentum-based movement and risk assessment.
details: A simplified vertical platformer inspired by Mappy. The player controls a mouse in a multi-story house. Key features: 1. Trampolines: Moving across a trampoline bounces the player higher with each consecutive jump. 2. Safety Limit: If a player bounces more than 4 times without landing on a solid floor, the trampoline breaks. 3. Items: Various treasures are placed on floors to be collected. 4. Enemies: One or more cats chase the player. Enemies cannot hurt the player while they are mid-air on a trampoline, only on the floors.
how_to_play: Goal: Collect all items on the floors to advance to the next level. Controls: Use Left and Right arrow keys to move. You automatically bounce on trampolines. Scoring: 100 points per item collected. 1000 points for level clear. Avoid cats on the floors and do not bounce on the same trampoline more than 4 times consecutively.
